props.definition: Table definition is an optional `array` of `objects` that defines look and behavior of the table. See details below.
props.items: Data to display in table. Each element of Array is an Object. Single Object is one record (row) of data
props.filter: Use this String to filter items. Filtering always emits update:page with value 1 and resets any active selection
props.page: Current page number. Changing page resets current selection
props.itemsPerPage: Number of records (rows) on single page. Setting it to `0` disables pagination
props.noHeader: If `true` does not display table headers
props.primaryKey: This props should be name of the property that is unique for every record. It is used as value for `key` attribute
props.emptyText: Text displayed if table is empty
props.emptyFilteredText: Text displayed if table is empty after filtering out all items
props.locale: Locale used to compare and sort strings
props.selectionMode: Enables or disables selection of rows. Valid values are 'single' (allows selection of single row only), 'multiple' (allows multiple rows to be selected) or `empty string` (disables selection). After new row is selected or unselected event input:selection is emmited with array of all selected records. Filtering, sorting, changing current page or modifying selection-mode prop resets current selection by emmiting empty array
props.state: State of table. Valid values are 'busy' or `empty string`. Busy state disables pointer events on table and renders contents of `busy` slot instead of table rows

emits.update:page: Emmited after filtering. Useful for updating pagination
emits.update:filtered-count: Emmited after filtering. Useful for updating pagination
emits.input:selection: Emmited after selecting rows. Event data contains array of selected records

slots.caption: Slot for caption text. Position caption using `caption-top` prop
slots.busy: Content of this slot replaces data records if table is `busy`
slots.empty-table-message: Slot for custom empty table message when `items` prop is empty table
slots.empty-filtered-table-message: Slot for custom empty filtered table message when table is empty after filtering
slots.cell:[key]: Slot for cell content. Useful for adding some html formatting, transforming value etc. Key is one of the keys of data record or additional key from definition array. Slot props: `value`, `item`
